details.abstract: In this study, there are presented theoretical basics for the stochastic constructive simulation of surveillance radar sensors as a generator of radar information with the stochastic character. To do this, the mathematical model of the creation of radar information is performed. The mathematical model is afterwards presented in the form of an algorithm flowchart for the process of the radar information creation. The model will be applied as part of a simulator for the staff training in the Czech Air Force operational centres.
